definition: generally speaking/to sum up/in summary/in short
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Overall, the students can not be blindly Starchaser.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，中学生不能盲目追星。

sentences.english: But overall, being raw just works for me.
sentences.chinese: 但是总的来说，我只是很适合成为生食者。

sentences.english: In sum, few people remain at subsistence level.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，很少人一直挣扎在温饱水平。

sentences.english: On the whole it's a good plan and we shouldn't nitpick .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，这个计划是好的，我们不应过于挑剔。

sentences.english: Savings in the aggregate are on the rise.
sentences.chinese: 储蓄额总的来说处于上升趋势。

sentences.english: In general , Scotland is colder throughout the year .
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，苏格兰全年较冷。

sentences.english: In general, the topic of hyper sclability can be challenging to address.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，超级可伸缩性是一个极具挑战性的主题。

sentences.english: There are many children and adolescents whose behavior is gener-ally unacceptable.
sentences.chinese: 很多儿童和青少年的举止总的来说不可接受。

sentences.english: In general, I would say, it's hard.
On the whole, it's well architected and remarkably flexible.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，它有良好的架构和显著的灵活性。

sentences.english: Yet by and large, the EITC helps only families with children.
sentences.chinese: 然而，总的来说，EITC只帮助有儿童的家庭。

sentences.english: So generally, I'm pretty satisfied with the app.
sentences.chinese: 所以总的来说，我对这个应用十分满意。

sentences.english: In general, I wouldn't worry about the effect of statins on memory.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，我不会担心司他汀对记忆力的影响。

sentences.english: In general, breeding density should not big.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，饲养密度宜小不宜大。

sentences.english: In a general sense, accuracy means correctness, truth, and exactitude.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，精准就是指正确，真实，以及精确。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, I take charge of the daily administration responsibilities in the office.
sentences.chinese: 总的来说，我主要是负责办事处的日常行政管理事务。
